text: Bhannus ki ke ma timila'i bata'um ki allahakaham yiniharubhanda pani naramro sajaya pa'une ko hun? Ti jasala'i allahale tiraskrta garyo ra jasamathi krodhita bhayo ra tiniharumadhye jasala'i bamdara ra sumgura bana'ihalyo ra jasale saitanako puja gare. Tyastaharuko lagi ekadamai naramro tha'um hunecha ra yiniharunai sahi batobata dherai vicalita huneharu hun
